articles.title: La K’onga & Nahuel Pennisi Score First Billboard Argentina Hot 100 No. 1
articles.description: The song sends “Entre Nosotros” to the runner-up slot.
articles.content: Argentinians La K’onga and Nahuel Pennisi earn their first No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated March 19) as “Universo Paralelo” rises 2-1 in its 10th week. The song dethrones “Entre Nosotros,” by the all-star team comprising Tiago P... [977 chars]

articles.title: When was the Falklands War and how long did it last?
articles.description: The Falklands War was a ten-week undeclared war between Argentina and the United Kingdom
articles.content:
The Falklands War took place from April 2, 1982 to June 14 of the same year. 2022 marks the fortieth anniversary of the conflict.
It was a ten-week undeclared war between Argentina and the United Kingdom, fought over two territories in the South Atla... [6157 chars]

articles.title: Fertilizer Prices Surge as Ukraine War Cuts Supply, Leaving Farmers Shocked
articles.description: Smaller harvests loom from Argentina to Indonesia, and developing countries are bracing for higher food costs.
articles.content:
In his nine years selling fertilizer to corn and rice farmers in West Africa, Malick Niang says he has never seen such a severe supply crunch—or such high prices.

articles.title: Soccer-Five South American teams still vying for World Cup berth
articles.description: The top four sides in the 10-team group qualify automatically and the fifth-placed side go into a playoff against a team from the Asian confederation. Uruguay, the only South American team outside Brazil and Argentina to win the World Cup, come into their match at home to Peru on the up and they fancy their chances of grabbing an automatic spot.
articles.content: The penultimate round of the South American World Cup qualifiers takes place on Thursday and five teams are still in with a chance of joining Brazil and Argentina at the finals in Qatar. Ecuador, Uruguay, Peru, Chile and Colombia all have a chance of... [2441 chars]

articles.description: As it stands, only 15 of the 32 finalists have been determined for the Nov. 21-Dec. 18 tournament. They are: Argentina, Belgium, Brazil, Croatia, Denmark, England, France, Germany, Iran Netherlands, Serbia, Spain, Switzerland, South Korea and Qatar as host.
